title: Emerge
description: Activates the 'EMERGING' actor flag during the specified duration and triggers 'on_done' at the end.

cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time
cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again.

on_done.title: Event: On Done
on_done.description: Trigger to be executed when the goal execution is about to end.
